name: Lower Lower
description:
explore a labyrinthine cave complex in search of a fabled albino grinch. upgrade your gear as you delve deeper underground.

Made for Ludum Dare 48 (DEEPER && DEEPER)

If you are playing the html5 version, please use Chrome or Edge. We have noticed severe performance issues while using Firefox. Sorry!

Controls:

WASD/ARROWS : Up, Down, Left, Right 

Space: Jump/(hold)wall jump while descending

z:cut rope/ toss rope

c: throw flares (when picked up)

shift: respawn at fire
